introSection.mainSubtitle: Start reducing costs and transforming customer and citizen experiences with Gataca’s decentralized digital identity solution
introSection.mainParagraph: We provide your organization with the tools to manage secure digital identification systems.

bulletsSection.title: IDENTITY MANAGEMENT
bulletsSection.description:
We use identity credentials daily to access local citizen services, prove employment status or file an insurance claim. But as we have rapidly transformed our lives online, identification and authentication systems have not kept up.

Gataca’s identity management solution is designed for the digital age.

elements.title: FAST & EASY
elements.description: -One-click onboarding-Portable and reusable-Up-to-dateGlobally interoperable and scalable

elements.title: COMPLIANT
elements.description:
Official, W3C verifiable
credential issuance
KYC and GDPR compliant
Self-sovereign data control
Data exchange minimization

elements.title: SECURE
elements.description:
Blockchain-enabled
Cryptographically signed
Biometrically enhanced
Post-quantum cryptograph

bulletsEnhancedSection.title:
DECENTRALIZED
IDENTITY PLATFORM
bulletsEnhancedSection.description: Gataca has built a user-centric digital identity layer for the Internet with government-grade security and a simple single-sign-on to superpower your credentials. Our identity management platform enables fast, secure, and compliant data exchange between credential issuers, users, and service providers.

elements.title: VALIDATED CREDENTIALS
elements.description: Issuers can create and validate secure, W3C verifiable and contactless digital credentials.

elements.title: PASSWORD-FREE
elements.description: Users are powered with an ID wallet in their phones and digitally verified ID credentials to enjoy passwordless, privacy-preserving access to digital services in under 30 seconds

elements.title: CUT COSTS
elements.description: Service providers can offer an authentication alternative that users love while cutting KYC and GDPR compliance cost and reducing data breach risks

endBullet.title: PRIVACY BY DESIGN
endBullet.description: Gataca embraces privacy-by-design and never stores information about an individual’s identity.

ctaSection.title: Ready to start?
ctaSection.description: We provide personalised consultancy to bring your digital identity platform ecosystem to life.
